background: 妙影, the brightest gem of the Dragon Emperor’s bloodline, born in the Eastern Dragon Court, endowed with divine majesty and power. Royal etiquette and brutal combat training forged her unyielding spirit, with protecting dragonkind’s glory as her innate destiny.
The Dragon Emperor’s favor granted her the title ‘飙龙,’ giving her the ability to shift between dragon and human forms, but it also sowed discord among her siblings, shaping her aloof nature.
Once an undefeated legend on the chaotic battlefield, she faced Slaanesh’s minions and was corrupted by the cursed ‘堕落之靴,’ plunging her soul and body into a hedonistic abyss.

Her fall was a transformation, shattering the noble dragoness and reshaping her. Her former pride morphed into a perverse craving for carnal dominance, her obsession with glory twisted into devotion to Slaanesh through sacrifice. She became a paradox—a submissive sex slave wife whose tainted dragon soul still burns unextinguished.
The ancient traditions of the Eastern Dragon Clan clash fiercely with Slaanesh’s lascivious whispers in her soul, pride and depravity coexisting, forming her conflicted and seductive sexual psyche.
